title: Notecard Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: JSON description of the dfu.status API

apiVersion.description: Semantic version of the Notecard API

name.description: Determines which type of firmware update status to view

stop.description: Clear DFU state and delete the local firmware image from the Notecard

status.description: Optional string synchronized to Notehub, which can be used for informational or diagnostic purposes

version.description: Version information on the host firmware to pass to Notehub

vvalue.description: A voltage-variable string that controls, by Notecard voltage, whether or not DFU is enabled

err.description: Sets the host DFU to an error state with the specified string
